title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL

items.title: How Trump is decimating federal employee unions one step at a time

items.title: Israel’s New Negotiating Stance Is Likely to Prolong Gaza War, Experts Say
items.description: A shift toward pressing for a permanent cease-fire deal, alongside plans for a new offensive in Gaza City, means the fighting is unlikely to end soon.

items.title: What to Know About the Earthquake in Afghanistan
items.description: Hundreds of people were killed, according to the Taliban government, and the death toll was expected to rise.

items.title: Xi, Putin and Modi Try to Signal Unity at China Summit
